Dear {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for joining me at Table at 7 last night, we hope you enjoyed your dinner with us! Here, at My Perrier-Jouët, we provide our members with moments to enhance and broaden your experiences as you further discover the world of champagne through our Season of Gastronomy.
We hope that you will join us again in our next dinner. Using your personal code provided on your registration card on my.perrier-jouet.com <[[http://my.perrier-jouet.com/SGP_BRD_1701_PJ_MyPerrierJouet_Page_SignUp.html?utm_source=thankyou-edm-mypj-table-at-7]]>, you can step into the House of Perrier-Jouët.
We would be delighted to share with you our exclusive privileges and I look forward to our next dinner experience together.
Yours Sincerely,
Marie
If you have any questions when keying in your code, please feel free to contact me at marie.deloffre@pernod-ricard.com <[[mailto:marie.deloffre@pernod-ricard.com]]>
